languages.text: {n}Мейв прикрывает глаза, будто бы прислушиваясь к воображаемой музыке и начинает танцевать. Ее танец скроен из простых движений, но изящество и легкость, с которыми она двигается, добавляет им очарования.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Лидзи прикрывает глаза, будто бы прислушиваясь к воображаемой музыке... и начинает танцевать. Ее танец скроен из простых движений, но изящество и легкость, с которыми она двигается, добавляет им очарования.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive closes her eyes, as if listening to music only she can hear, and begins to sway. Her dance is made up of simple movements, but the grace and ease with which she performs them add to their charm.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мейв прикрывает глаза, будто бы прислушиваясь к воображаемой музыке и начинает танцевать. Ее танец скроен из простых движений, но изящество и легкость, с которыми она двигается, добавляет им очарования.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive closes her eyes as if listening to music only she can hear, and begins to dance. Her dance is made up of simple movements, but the grace and ease with which she moves add to their charm.{/n}

languages.text: {n}梅芙闭上了双眼，身体开始摇摆起来，仿佛在聆听只有她才能听到的音乐一样。尽管她的舞蹈动作很简单，但她优雅、轻松的仪态，让她的舞蹈别具魅力。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive closes her eyes, as if listening to music only she can hear, and begins to sway. Her dance is made up of simple movements, but the grace and ease with which she performs them add to their charm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙闭上了双眼，身体开始摇摆起来，仿佛在聆听只有她才能听到的音乐一样。尽管她的舞蹈动作很简单，但她优雅、轻松的仪态，让她的舞蹈别具魅力。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive cierra los ojos, como si escuchase una música que solo ella puede oír, y empieza a cimbrearse. Danza con movimientos sencillos, pero la gracia y facilidad con que los ejecuta contribuye a realzar sus encantos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive closes her eyes, as if listening to music only she can hear, and begins to sway. Her dance is made up of simple movements, but the grace and ease with which she performs them add to their charm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive cierra los ojos, como si escuchase una música que solo ella puede oír, y empieza a cimbrearse. Danza con movimientos sencillos, pero la gracia y facilidad con que los ejecuta contribuye a realzar sus encantos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini kapatan Maive, sanki sadece kendi duyabildiği bir müziği dinliyormuş gibi sallanmaya başlıyor. Dansı basit hareketlerden oluşsa da onları sergilediği zarafet ve rahatlık, çekiciliklerine katkıda bulunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive closes her eyes, as if listening to music only she can hear, and begins to sway. Her dance is made up of simple movements, but the grace and ease with which she performs them add to their charm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini kapatan Maive, sanki sadece kendi duyabildiği bir müziği dinliyormuş gibi sallanmaya başlıyor. Dansı basit hareketlerden oluşsa da onları sergilediği zarafet ve rahatlık, çekiciliklerine katkıda bulunuyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}メイヴは、まるで彼女だけが聞くことのできる曲に耳を傾け、目を閉じ、揺れ始める。彼女のダンスは、シンプルな動きで構成されるが、その優美さと気安さがダンスに魅力を加える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive closes her eyes, as if listening to music only she can hear, and begins to sway. Her dance is made up of simple movements, but the grace and ease with which she performs them add to their charm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴは、まるで彼女だけが聞くことのできる曲に耳を傾け、目を閉じ、揺れ始める。彼女のダンスは、シンプルな動きで構成されるが、その優美さと気安さがダンスに魅力を加える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive ferme les yeux, comme pour écouter une musique qu'elle seule peut entendre, et commence à se balancer. Sa danse est décomposée en mouvements simples, mais gracieux, et l'aisance avec laquelle elle enchaîne les mouvements ne fait qu'ajouter à son charme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive closes her eyes, as if listening to music only she can hear, and begins to sway. Her dance is made up of simple movements, but the grace and ease with which she performs them add to their charm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive ferme les yeux, comme pour écouter une musique qu'elle seule peut entendre, et commence à se balancer. Sa danse est décomposée en mouvements simples, mais gracieux, et l'aisance avec laquelle elle enchaîne les mouvements ne fait qu'ajouter à son charme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive schließt die Augen, als würde sie einer Musik lauschen, die nur sie hören kann, und beginnt, sich hin und her zu wiegen. Ihr Tanz besteht aus einfachen Bewegungen, doch die Anmut und Leichtigkeit, mit der sie diese ausführt, verleihen ihnen einen gewissen Zauber.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive closes her eyes, as if listening to music only she can hear, and begins to sway. Her dance is made up of simple movements, but the grace and ease with which she performs them add to their charm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive schließt die Augen, als würde sie einer Musik lauschen, die nur sie hören kann, und beginnt, sich hin und her zu wiegen. Ihr Tanz besteht aus einfachen Bewegungen, doch die Anmut und Leichtigkeit, mit der sie diese ausführt, verleihen ihnen einen gewissen Zauber.{/n}
